MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text:
The nycaloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. The nycaloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, invisibility (self only), mirror image

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The nycaloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Weapons
MonsterTrait.Text: The nycaloth's weapon attacks are magical.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The nycaloth makes two melee attacks, or it makes one melee attack and teleports before or after the attack.

MonsterAction.Name: Claw
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (2d4) slashing damage at the start of each of its turns due to a fiendish wound. Each time the nycaloth hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 (2d4). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful DC 13 Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

MonsterAction.Name: Greataxe
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) slashing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Teleport
MonsterTrait.Text: The nycaloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

MonsterTrait.Name: Variant: Summon Yugoloth (1/Day)
MonsterTrait.Text: The yugoloth chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning. A nycaloth has a 50 percent chance of summoning 1d4 mezzoloths or one nycaloth. A summoned yugoloth appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, does as it pleases, and can't summon other yugoloths. The summoned yugoloth remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner takes a bonus action to dismiss it.
